definition: Hart or Herd (name)/Robert Hart (1835-1911), Englishman who served 1863-1911 in Qing dynasty customs office
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Readhead believes that, despite their best intentions, parents can be obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德赫德相信，就算心懷好意，家長也可能成爲阻礙。

sentences.english: Consumers might be more prone to making the Internet switch than they were a few years ago, Mr. Hurd said.
sentences.chinese: 赫德說，消費者可能比幾年前換臺換得更勤。

sentences.english: But this analysis points out the huge "deficit" in his grammar book.
sentences.chinese: 這些分析指出赫德明語法書的不足之處。

sentences.english: Mr Hurd had the grace to turn down their praise.
sentences.chinese: 赫德先生有拒絕別人讚美的雅量。

sentences.english: Heard from the conditions, the devil laughed at the angel that she was even worse than a devil.
sentences.chinese: 從條件赫德，魔鬼笑的天使，她甚至比魔鬼更壞。

sentences.english: Sam was beaming, caught deep in Craighead's web.
sentences.chinese: 薩姆滿臉笑容，被克萊赫德的蜘蛛型魚鉤深深吸引。

sentences.english: And file lawsuits when Mr. Ellison hires Mr. Hurd.
sentences.chinese: 然後在埃裏森把赫德招過去時提起訴訟。

sentences.english: Ms Fisher denied having been in a relationship with Hurd.
sentences.chinese: 費舍爾還說，她與赫德並無戀愛史。

sentences.english: But "what we have found is going a step further, " Holdereid explained.
sentences.chinese: 但“我們的發現更進一步，”赫德萊德解釋說。

sentences.english: Consumers might be more prone to making the Internet switch than they were a few years ago, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 赫德說，消費者可能比幾年前換臺換得更勤。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter shows the contribution Hesser made to the research of teaching Chinese as a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 第五章指出赫德明對對外漢語教學的貢獻。

sentences.english: Yang said the only post for Krautzen is as an advisor for the women's team.
sentences.chinese: 楊先生說，意克赫德只能當中國女足的顧問。

sentences.english: Fahad indicated that the bilateral economic and trade cooperation is an important part of Oman-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 法赫德說，阿中經貿合作是阿中關係的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: It has been a year since H-P fired Mr. Hurd.
sentences.chinese: 惠普炒掉赫德已有一年時間。

sentences.english: and the son of Fahd, who still governs the Eastern Province.
sentences.chinese: 另一個是法赫德的兒子，他仍然掌握着東部省份。

definition: Westerner employed in Qing China (as professor or military advisor etc)
William A.P. Martin (1827-1916), American missionary who lived 62 years in China between 1850 and 1916, and helped found many Chinese colleges, first president of Peking University
Captain William M Lang (1843-), British adviser to the Qing north China navy 北洋水師|北洋水师 during the 1880s
Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), British diplomat and sinologist, originator of the Wade-Giles Chinese romanization system
Earl George Macartney (1737-1806), leader of British mission to Qing China in 1793/Paul McCartney, former Beatle
